# str.rdev

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of str.rdev is for data cleaning and manipulation of the Enron email dataset, specifically an XLS attachment of data, and a small Shiny app to display the results.

## Installation

You can install the released version of example from [GitHub](https://github.com) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("yanz333/str.rdev")
```

## Details

Two paragraphs explaining what this package does.
